permissions: Update permission is delegated to the related project_customer and ultimately the project; allowed for users who can update the project under ProjectPolicy (admins or users who are practically managers of the project developer).
side_effects: Updates the project cost code (explicit description).
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one attribute must be provided; the command errors if no updatable attributes are set. explicit-description is only sent if the flag is present.

flags.name: --explicit-description
flags.description: Explicit cost code description (example: --explicit-description "Custom labor description").
